DocLocalization.Name: DÃ©finition de section d'un profil en I

DocAttribute.Name: OverallWidth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Total extent of the width, defined parallel to the x axis of the position coordinate system.

DocAttribute.Name: OverallDepth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Total extent of the depth, defined parallel to the y axis of the position coordinate system.

DocAttribute.Name: WebThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Thickness of the web of the I-shape. The web is centred on the x-axis and the y-axis of the position coordinate system.

DocAttribute.Name: FlangeThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Flange thickness of the I-shape. Both, the upper and the lower flanges have the same thickness and they are centred on the y-axis of the position coordinate system.

DocAttribute.Name: FilletRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: The fillet between the web and the flange. 0 if sharp-edged, omitted if unknown.

DocAttribute.Name: FlangeEdgeRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: Radius of the lower edges of the top flange and the upper edges of the bottom flange. 0 if sharp-edged, omitted if unknown.

DocAttribute.Name: FlangeSlope
DocAttribute.Documentation: Slope of the lower faces of the top flange and of the upper faces of the bottom flange. Non-zero in case of tapered flanges, 0 in case of parallel flanges, omitted if unknown.

DocWhereRule.Name: ValidFlangeThickness
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The sum of flange thicknesses shall be less than the overall depth.

DocWhereRule.Name: ValidWebThickness
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The web thickness shall be less then the flange width.

DocWhereRule.Name: ValidFilletRadius
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The FilletRadius, if given, shall be within the range of allowed values.
